sentences.en: The critics raved about his performance in 'Hamlet'.
sentences.cn: 评论家们热情赞扬了他在《哈姆雷特》中的表演。

sentences.en: The local dramatic society is doing 'Hamlet' next month.
sentences.cn: 地方戏剧社准备下月演出《哈姆雷特》。

sentences.en: Our new production of 'Hamlet' is currently in rehearsal.
sentences.cn: 我们的新版《哈姆雷特》正在排练之中。
